main_definition: The process of transferring data or software from a remote computer, server, or storage device to a local computer or device.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Acquiring digital content such as music, videos, books, etc., from the internet onto your personal device
meanings_and_examples.example: I was downloading my favorite album by Taylor Swift on my phone.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Transferring software or applications from a remote server to your computer for use
meanings_and_examples.example: The IT department helped us download the latest version of our office suite onto all company laptops.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Retrieving files that were previously stored in cloud storage services like Google Drive, Dropbox, etc.
meanings_and_examples.example: I needed to download a presentation I had saved on my Google Drive before the meeting started.
Illegal downloading of copyrighted music files is against federal law, but many still engage in it.
